title: Stephen Moore | Web Developer
tagline: - Modular web apps, REST APIs, and immersive D&D campaigns
aboutIntro: I create modular web apps, REST APIs in Go, and design intricate D&D campaigns blending cryptography and narrative.
aboutParagraphs: I was a Garbage Man for over 2 decades before transitioning into tech. During that time, I developed a strong work ethic, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills that have served me well in my career as a developer.
I started my education in 3D modeling and animation. My approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy crafting immersive tabletop RPG campaigns, blending storytelling with game mechanics to create engaging experiences for players.

experience.title: Web Designer and developer
experience.description: Lead on front-end development and design working directly with the owner to tailor a custom website and photo and video manipulation.

projects.title: Game Master Tools
projects.description: a feature rich web application for managing tabletop RPG campaigns
